name: AVAssetVariantQualifier
desc: An object that represents an HTTP Live Streaming asset variant.

items.name: init(variant: AVAssetVariant)
items.desc: Creates a variant qualifier with an asset variant.

items.name: class AVAssetVariant
items.desc: An object that represents a bit rate variant.

items.name: init(predicate: NSPredicate)
items.desc: Creates a variant qualifier with a predicate.

items.name: class func predicate(forChannelCount: Int, mediaSelectionOption: AVMediaSelectionOption, operatorType: NSComparisonPredicate.Operator) -> NSPredicate
items.desc: Creates a predicate with a channel count, media selection option, and operator type.

items.name: class func predicate(forPresentationHeight: CGFloat, operatorType: NSComparisonPredicate.Operator) -> NSPredicate
items.desc: Creates a predicate with a height and operator type.

items.name: class func predicate(forPresentationWidth: CGFloat, operatorType: NSComparisonPredicate.Operator) -> NSPredicate
items.desc: Creates a predicate with a width and operator type.
